name: Thomas Phillips

motivations.feelaboutpeople: People are tools. Use them for your own goals and discard them.

history: Tom Phillips is the anchorman on channel WNS-7, Night City News force Team. So believe he is the epitome of Style over Substance. He is a great communicator and is comfortable in all social situation. However he is a tool. World News Service knows it and uses him to propagate their agenda and their corporate allies. He is very self-indulgent and has a minor gambling problem. Though friendly on air and to stranger, his attitude changes to a pre-Madonna to his staff in private. Since he is one of the stars of WNS network, often there are various cover ups to make sure any indiscretions are completely covered up.
